casebody.data:
TAYLOR
v.
CAROLINA RESTAURANT, et al. No. 377A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 14, 2005. Jaye E. Bingham, Erin F. Taylor, Raleigh, for Carolina Restaurant, et al. Fred D. Poisson, Jr., Wadesboro, for Rebecca Taylor.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Rebecca Taylor) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of September 2005."
